short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to select LinkedIn profiles and send emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The LinkedIn Email Bot is an advanced tool designed to seamlessly integrate with your LinkedIn account, automating the process of retrieving and managing emails. This bot simplifies your workflow by ensuring that all important LinkedIn communications are collected, organized, and delivered directly to your preferred email client or platform.
